question: This program has been recommended to me.  Though I have not yet seen it I wanted to post the link so any who are interested can watch.  It features 3 uninsured people (one with cancer, one with AS and one with diabetes) seeking health care.  It is still showing in some areas so you can check your local listings too.  Nice that it is available to view online through 11/11/08!http://www.pbs.org/pov/pov2008/criticalcondition/fullfilm.html
title: PBS Program on Uninsured - online 'till 11/11
